Àtụ:Infobox dam
Woodstock Dam dị n'elu Tugela, mpaghara KwaZulu-Natal nke Ndịda Afrịka ma bụrụ isi iyi mmiri maka nke akpọrọ ndịa na bekee Thukela-Vaal Transfer Scheme. E nyere mmiri ahụ ọrụ na afọ 1982, nwere ikike nchekwa nke ọnụ Ọgụgụ ndịa ;373.26 nde bic mita (13.182×10^9 cu ft), na mpaghara elu nke 29.129 Skwer kilomita (11.247 sq mi), mgbidi mmiri ahụ dị mita iri ise na anọ (177 ) [citation needed] elu. Dam ahụ na-arụ ọrụ maka ebumnuche mmiri nke obodo na nke ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta ihe ma enwere ike itinye ya n'ihe ize ndụ dị elu (3)
